titleStmt.title: The mirror of honor wherein euerie professor of armes, from the generall, chieftaines and high commanders, to the priuate officer and inferiour souldier, may see the necessitie of the feare and seruice of God, and the vse of all diuine vertues, both in commanding and obeying, practising and proceeding in the most honorable affayres of warre. A treatise most necessarie ...
titleStmt.author: Norden, John, 1548-1625?

publicationStmt.publisher: By the widowe Orwin for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
